title: Blackjack Wayward
description: I saved the world and as a reward for my hard work, they sent me back to Shard World, banished from my home, and from the woman I most desire. A woman who betrayed me in the end.But I made it back once. I built a warp hole generator from the rocks and stones. I'm going to build another one, find a way back somehow...Because the world hasn't seen the last of me.
author: Ben Bequer
